pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 29, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, June 29, 2017:

Cardigan, Prince Edward Island

8:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Prince Edward Island, Wade MacLauchlan.

Rodd Brudenell Resort
86 Dewars Lane
Cardigan, Prince Edward Island

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.

Montague, Prince Edward Island

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Community Coffee Meet & Greet with the Member of Parliament for Cardigan, Lawrence MacAulay, and will deliver remarks.

Montague Curling Club
23 Central Street
Montague, Prince Edward Island

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.

Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Canada C3 Expedition ship.

Charlottetown Harbour

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity for tour

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Charlottetown Harbour

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.

Fredericton, New Brunswick

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit athletes competing in the 38e Finale des Jeux de l’Acadie.

Sainte-Anne Community Centre
715 Priestman Street
Fredericton, New Brunswick

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.

Grand Bay-Westfield, New Brunswick

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Canada Day Kick-Off Ice Cream Social.

Brundage Point River Centre
4 Ferry Road
Grand Bay-Westfield, New Brunswick

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:00 p.m.

Note: All times local

Media appearance

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on TVA’s Salut Bonjour in two parts, at 7:40 a.m. and 8:35 a.m. ET
